results.title: Benefit of Adding Ezetimibe to Statin Therapy on Cardiovascular Outcomes and Safety in Patients With Versus Without Diabetes Mellitus: Results From IMPROVE-IT (Improved Reduction of Outcomes: Vytorin Efficacy International Trial).
authors: IMPROVE-IT (Improved Reduction of Outcomes: Vytorin Efficacy International Trial) Investigators
results.text_hl: In contrast, among @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ without @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@, those with a high risk score experienced a significant (18%) relative reduction in the composite of @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular death@@@, @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@ischemic stroke@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@E/S@@@ compared with placebo/@CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, whereas @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ without @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@ at low or moderate risk demonstrated no benefit with the addition of @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ to @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (Pint =0.034).

citations.NLM: Giugliano RP, Cannon CP, Blazing MA, Nicolau JC, Corbalán R, Špinar J, Park JG, White JA, Bohula EA, Braunwald E, IMPROVE-IT (Improved Reduction of Outcomes: Vytorin Efficacy International Trial) Investigators. Benefit of Adding Ezetimibe to Statin Therapy on Cardiovascular Outcomes and Safety in Patients With Versus Without Diabetes Mellitus: Results From IMPROVE-IT (Improved Reduction of Outcomes: Vytorin Efficacy International Trial). Circulation. 2018 Apr 10;137(15):1571-1582. PMID: 29263150
